```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Now regress AM on MPG

```{r cars}
input            <- mtcars
input$am         <- as.factor(input$am)
levels(input$am) <- c('AT', 'MT')

fit <- lm(mpg~am,data=input)
summary(fit)
```
